snippet.title: ADK Damashii | Announce Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: Announcing a very special compilation disc, ADK DAMASHII, for release on PS4. This compilation disc was originally released on PS2 as a Japan-only release and is a collection of NEOGEO titles that were developed by ADK, also known as Alpha Denshi Corporation. For today’s blog post, we want to discuss each game included in this compilation and why they are so important to the NEOGEO legacy
